title: God Mode for Property Prices
hook: I bet you didn't know you could see this data for free. 🤫
body:
Visual: Fast-paced screen recording zooming into a random luxury property/land plot.

Audio: 'Stop Zillow surfing. OneMap lets you click on almost any plot of land and see the official land lot info, ownership type, and even recent transaction prices in the area.'

Visual: Tapping on a building to reveal detailed 'LandQuery' information and overlaying a heat map of property prices.

Audio: 'It’s like having God Mode for the city right in your pocket.'
callToAction: Link in bio to get the app.
